item.title: Santa Catarina Palopo Travel Guide (Lake Atitl√°n/Western Highlands/Guatemala/Central America/North America)
item.description: Plan your trip to Santa Catarina Palopo with this comprehensive tour guide, which includes information on places to visit, hiking and biking routes, food and drink scene, where to stay, local culture and customs, safety and health, transportation options, and nearby destinations and excursions.
